title: #76 - Bugha Reveals the One Thing He Bought after his $3 Million Fortnite Win
itunes:title: #76 - Bugha Reveals the One Thing He Bought after his $3 Million Fortnite Win
description: On this episode of The CouRage and Nadeshot Show podcast, Sentinels' Bugha comes onto the show as a guest to talk about the aftermath of winning $3 million at the Fortnite World Cup, leaving Fortnite for Valorant, his opinion of the best Fortnite players, how his dad got him into gaming, and more!

itunes:author: 100 Thieves
